strings: <voice_0x01001378><se_def>Marek: That evil dog flew off to the east, yes?
<voice_0x01001379><se_def>Marek: East, hm... I think the Lord High Priest's island is to the east.
<voice_0x0100137A><se_def>Marek: Oh-yo-yoy! You say you have been chasing this dog!? You must not give up!

<voice_0x0100137B><se_def>Marek: We cannot allow another life to be
sacrificed like my mother's.
You must find him and defeat him!
<voice_0x0100137C><se_low>King Trode: Believe me, his list of crimes needed no addition to persuade us of that.
<voice_0x0100137D><se_low>King Trode: But what are we supposed to do now!? We finally catch up with the fiend and he flies off! How can we possibly hope to follow!?
<voice_0x0100137F><se_def>Marek: If the enemy can fly, then you need to fly too... You must enlist the help of the Godbird Empyrea!
<voice_0x01001380><se_def>Marek: There are monuments about her in the shrine inside this ruin.

<voice_0x01001381><se_def>Marek: It is written on them how she fights
against evil.

<voice_0x01001382><se_def>Marek: If anyone can help you in this battle,
I am certain that Empyrea can.
